page.title: 16ECOLOGY 2
page.content: Walking upwards ,bracken still grows but also with nettles and moss. We are now at 1175ft and granite has become exposed at the surface. Bracken has now lessened but there is an abundance of many different kinds of mosses.As the walk proceeds, vegetation cover increases and both mosses and bracken are abundant .At 1230ft, bracken is again the main vegetation cover,but also granite is becoming more and more exposed. Further up, between 1275-1290 ft. granite becomes increasingly exposed, accompanied with bracken, moss and various sorts of lichen. At this height one woodpigeon was sighted. Near the summit of Sharpitor granite took over the landscape. The top of Sharpitor is 1325 ft. The tor is heavily weathered and the vegetation is sparse.
